subject: Baseball
Free Agents (Sports)
lead_paragraph: John Schuerholz has vowed not to do business with shortstop Rafael Furcal’s agents, whom Schuerholz accused in a newspaper interview of conducting “despicable” dealings with the team.
snippet: John Schuerholz has vowed not to do business with shortstop Rafael Furcal’s agents, whom Schuerholz accused in a newspaper interview of conducting “despicable” dealings with the team.
